result.arabic_text: لِيَقۡطَعَ طَرَفٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَوۡ يَكۡبِتَهُمۡ فَيَنقَلِبُواْ خَآئِبِينَ
result.translation: 127. Yalli Badri Saaku moominiinit woo cato kah Abem koroosite marak horta Qidaah hinnay Qidimik keenik tisillimem Rookittaah xixxibittamkeh iyyaanama, tokkel usun (koros kinnuk) gurrusak Sugen iisak Buhaanaah xixxibaane luk gacan.
